conditions.short_description: Little snow is left in the lowlands in most parts but new snow is in the mountains.
conditions.full_description: Little snow is left in the lowlands in most parts but new snow is in the mountains. Some wind slabs may form in the uppermost part of mountains and a persistant weak layer is found in upper elevations of Eyjafjörður. New snow is expected in mountains and in the north on Wednesday.

area_forecast.forecast: Not much snow in the region and older snow high in the mountains is considered stable. Slight snowfall excpected high in the mountains on Wednesday.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Not much snow in the region and older snow high in the mountains is considered stable after mild weather and rain recently. On Wednesday, a slight snowfall is expected in easterly winds high in the mountains, and wind slabs may begin to form on western aspects.
area_forecast.weather: Milt veður og hægviðri þar til lægð gengur nærri landinu á miðvikudag með skammvinnri úrkomu í austanátt.

area_forecast.forecast: Generally rather little snow but wind slabs high in the mountains which can be unstable. NE-snow on Wednesday.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Couple of wet-slabs in Súgandafjörður on 11.dec
area_forecast.snow_condition: It is generally rather snow-free, but snow has managed to accumulate on the sheltered sides of the mountains after prolonged northeasterly winds and snow showers. The snow has melted and settled lower down in the mountains. At the highest elevations there has been some additional accumulation, but snow has also subsided. No snow pits have been dug to assess stability, but it should be assumed that recent wind slabs may be unstable. New snow expected on Wednesday.
area_forecast.weather: Hæglætisveður á þriðjudag. Vaxandi NA-átt á miðvikudag með snjókomu. Hægari NA-átt og dregur úr úrkomu á fimmtudag.

area_forecast.forecast: Wind slabs are likely present on south- and west-facing aspects high in the mountains. Additional snowfall on Wednesday will likely temporarily increase instability.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Wind slabs are likely present high in the mountains. Recently, there has been a slight snowfall all the way down to lowlands. On Wednesday, considerable snowfall is expected in the mountains in easterly winds, and instability is anticipated to increase as a result.
area_forecast.weather: Hægur vindur og lítilsháttar éljagangur þar til á miðvikudag þegar bætir búist er við töluverðri snjókomu til fjalla í austlægri átt.

area_forecast.forecast: New snow er high in the mountains but warm temperatures and rain has affected the snow. Snow has melted or subsided at lower elevations. No reports of avalanches since last week that could indicate stability.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Three avalanches released in Norðfjörður and Fagridalur on Dec 5th. No new reports of avalanches last few days.
area_forecast.snow_condition: New snow er high in the mountains but warm temperatures and rain has affected the snow. Snow has melted or subsided at lower elevations. No reports of recent avalanches that could indicate stability.
area_forecast.weather: Hæglætis veður á þriðjudag. A-átt og rigning á miðvikudag en snjókoma efst í fjöll. Hægur vindur á fimmtudag og lítilsháttar skúrir.

weather_forecast.forecast: Rain on Wednesday in the south and east. Snow in mountains and in the northwest.
